entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [JIT] x64 InitValueNumStoreStatics is 261k #85953
    8.0.0
  • Could not find chrome snapshot folder for Linux_x64 #85949
  • Memory usage reported by the process greatly mismatches the dump #85948
  • Readonly access of JsonObject with dynamic is not working #85943
  • [android] Mono AOT compiler fails in main/.NET 8 Preview 5 #85940
  • Polymorphic deserialization of a composite collection throws NullReferenceException #85934
  • [API Proposal]: KeySizes.IsValidSize #85931
    Future
  • Performance regression on Fortunes Windows #85930
  • [NativeAOT] consider using casting cache in GVMLookupForSlot scenario. #85927
  • [High Memory] Consumed approximately 300MB of additional memory with latest runtime docker image 6.0.16 #85924
  • Stack overflow exception thrown by `JsonSerializer.Deserialize` in a special case #85922
  • `Double.NegativeZero` is actually `+0.0` #85914
  • [API Proposal]: update API signatures to leverage ref readonly parameters #85911
  • [API Proposal]: RequiresLocationAttribute (supporting ref readonly parameters) #85910
    Future
  • Could IServiceProvider support modularlized applications? #85907
  • [NativeAOT] Missed devirtualization opportunities due to Unsafe.As #85906
  • Test failure JIT\\SIMD\\Matrix4x4_ro\\Matrix4x4_ro.cmd #85899
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Windows service infrequently results in error 1067 on stop operation #62579
    8.0.0
  • GetDirectorySynchronizationCookie() returns empty cookie #49376
    Future
  • Edit and Continue for members of generic types #11036
    Future
  • Implement support for updating generic methods during EnC/Hot Reload #80749
    8.0.0
  • [Crossgen2] Fix RVA field access in composite mode #78723
    8.0.0
  • Failed to load libcoreclr.so on Raspberry Pi Zero 2W when running C# program using .NET Core Debugger (vsdbg) #85680
  • Repeated generation of same interface (name) causes InvalidCastException with DispatchProxy.Create #84755
  • Extract array of const to static readonly field #33794
    8.0.0
  • CA1416 Triggered even though platform validity check has been completed. #77902
  • JIT: more unexpected dynamic PGO schema mismatches #85856
    8.0.0
  • Proxy authentication seems to not work with proxies that are not Fiddler #82743
  • [wasm?] Mono interpreter vector argument alignment issue #85071
    8.0.0
  • ARM64 - Test failure `Interop/COM/ComWrappers/API/ComWrappersTests/ComWrappersTests.sh` #85721
  • [API Proposal]: System.IO.Compression: ZipFile.CreateFromDirectory: Provide overload for writing to stream #85822
  • Investigate getting rid of reflection blocking #72570
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [6.0-staging] Improve Servicing Docs #85955
    documentation, area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Update class for Unsafe.As<>() #85954
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Avoid an assert if the class name table is too large. #85952
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Delete `GT_CNS_LNG` #85951
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][llvm] Fix an assert. #85950
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Remove Windows arm32 support #85947
    area-Infrastructure
  • [PERF] Fix Linux Musl Alpine Core Root build #85946
    area-Infrastructure
  • Save 240k in InitValueNumStoreStatics #85945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use popcount intrinsincs in BitOperations #85944
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix bug in jump threading #85942
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add PreserveSig support to ComInterfaceGenerator #85941
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add Base64.IsValid and allow Base64.DecodeXx methods to skip whitespace #85938
    area-System.Memory, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Disable IUnknownTest under GCStress #85937
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Disable foreground-shutdown test on Windows #85936
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Constrained mask should take into account busy registers #85933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Webcil-in-WebAssembly #85932
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Exclude the test DevDiv_255294.cmd on Windows arm in issues.targets #85928
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Optimizations for Ascii.Equals and Ascii.EqualsIgnoreCase #85926
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Delete rarely used bashing methods and add some documentation on bashing #85925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][aot] Generate 'native-indirect' wrappers in full-aot mode. #85923
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Allow set GC configuraiton in NativeAOT #85921
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable v128 and wasm packedsimd in the interpreter #85920
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Attempt to bypass emscripten's generated wrappers for cwraps #85919
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove last `!` from Caching.Abstractions #85918
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Remove Vector<T> fallbacks for Vector128<T> #85916
    area-System.Memory
  • Add Ubuntu Kinetic 22.10 and Mantic 23.10 RIDs #85912
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Stop using ref counts in forward sub #85909
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Deduplicate runtime invoke wrappers on iOS #85908
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fixed errors in jit and unwinding #85900
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Merged

  • Delete call to `GetMethod` in runtime type system #85902
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [main] Servicing docs improvements #85855
    area-Meta
  • Reorder the url lib install #85935
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Port perfmap environment variable change to 7.0 #85072
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.7
  • Ensure the insTupleType mask entries stay correct #85870
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revert "[release/8.0-preview4] Bump package version for .net 7 to 7.0.6" #85929
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update version of Python urllib3 #85915
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • Speed up `GVMLookupForSlot` #85901
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use Roslyn Source Generator Testing SDK to test interop source generators #84867
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement, source-generator
  • Add test for unnmanaged delegates interop #85903
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix RVA field access in composite Crossgen2 build (#78723) #85800
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Fetch interpreter opcode info from the runtime instead of generating a table #85904
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [wasm] Prune opcodes in the jiterpreter if they follow an unconditional bailout/exit #85905
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • [PERF] Pin urllib to version 1.26.15 for perf runs #85881
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: assert if we see schema mismatches with dynamic pgo data #85898
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Fix arg alignment issues when mixing with compiled code #85153
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Get rid of reflection blocked types #85810
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • Avoid reporting frozen segments in GetGenerationBounds #85727
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Intrinsify Unsafe.Read/Write, handle struct BitCast #85562
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Create a createdump static library for single-file dump generation #84864
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Move assignment rationalization to before global morph #85872
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fold typeof(T).TypeHandle.Value #85804
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Enable EVEX feature: embedded broadcast for Vector256.Add() in limited cases #84821
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Update PropertyTabAttribute.Equals() nullability #85896
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add IPC commands to enable and disable PerfMaps/JitDumps #85801
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Capture remaining binding methods for source generator support #85843
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Enabling RuntimeEventSource in NativeAOT #85424
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Templatize `enregisterLocalVars` in various methods of LSRA #85144
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Misc LSRA throughput improvements #85842
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove check from FillStringChecked and rename it to CopyStringContent #85880
    area-System.Runtime
  • Print out the script that the CI script is running #85624
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Allow the user to control the MaxVectorTBitWidth and PreferredVectorBitWidth #85551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • [mono][tasks] Extract EmitWasmBundle into generic EmitBundle task and enable bundling in mono self-contained library #84191
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Expose various integer intrinsics for Avx512F, Avx512BW, and Avx512CD #85833
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Restore missing API from Extensions #85846
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Logging
  • Fold "FrozenObjectHandle(REF) + CNS" to a byref constant #85888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unroll StringBuilder.Append for const string #85894
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [JIT] X64 - Centralize peephole optimization for removing redundant `mov` instructions #85780
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Interface inheritance follow up #85117
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] Trigger relinking if WasmNativeStrip=false #85857
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Peel offsets from spilled addresses for store decomposition #85889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle different SIMD moves in peephole optimization #85875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable option to use the Windows ThreadPool #85373
    area-System.Threading
  • Dogfood ComInterfaceGenerator in crossgen2 #84643
    NO-MERGE, area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Delete `gtNewBlkOpNode` and `lvSimdBaseJitType` #85848
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [nativeaot][tests] Add Native AOT iOS perf scenarios #85317
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Start dynamic heap count work #84168
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Relax address exposure check for tailcalls #65102
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Attempt to devirtualize call if we have type information about `this` #85528
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add ToDictionary() overloads for KeyValuePair and ValueTuple kv. #85811
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Improve Ascii (and Utf8) encoding #85266
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Upgrade System.Reflection.Metadata version #85738
    area-R2RDump-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CDATA Block is not formatter correctly in VS #68134
    17.7 P4
  • EditorConfig not taken into account if the filename is not `.editorconfig` #68130
  • Compiler allow wrong implicit convert from zero (0) to Enum in method argument without emit an error or warning! #68127

Closed

  • Source code generator compiles with 0 erros, but I get "This generator is not generating files" #67214

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove all fields from SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol in the common case. #68135
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Compare reference names up front #68133
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Pack bits in SourceOrdinaryMethodSymbol into an existing bitflag structure we have for all source methods #68132
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use a singleton sentinel for empty type-parameters for non-generic named-types and methods. #68131
    Area-Compilers
  • Enable some `await` scenarios involving inline arrays #68129
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays

Merged

  • Switch to a background thread before performing work in AbstractAddImportsPasteCommandHandler #68120
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix typo in incremental generators doc #68128
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Community, Next
  • Add dependency to x64 SerivceHub vsix #68117
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.4 #68066
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Razor internals #67644
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add ServiceHub vsix for ARM64 #68099
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Initial support for collection literal spread elements #67942
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve parsing of switch expressions whith missing `}` or `]` #67943
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Allocate all CSharp.BindingDiagnosticBag instances from a pool. #68108
    Area-Compilers, 17.7
  • Install ServiceHub x64 vsix for integration test #68113
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Reuse member names collection in decl tree across edits #67753
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove need for inheritance in BindingDiagnosticBag #68042
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add `AdditionalTextValueProvider<TValue>` #68092
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged
  • Check language version for inline arrays feature #68109
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Use one instance of MSBuild BuildManager per MSBuildWorkspace #52151
    Area-IDE, Community

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WebAssembly Msal TryAddAdditionalParameter does nothing #48136
  • Perf regression: endpoint, plainTextWithFilter #48135
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #48134
  • Adding Blazor WebAssembly project reference breaks Hot Reloading for Razor pages #48132
  • Uncaught (in promise) Error: Found malformed component comment at Blazor: #48123
  • Perf regression: endpoint, mvc, plaintext #48119
  • Handle `AsParameters`-enabled types with indexers in request delegate creation #48118

Closed

  • Dev cert issue #47834
  • AmbiguousMatchException when deployed on azure infrastructure #48130
  • Remove Razor SDK dependency in StaticWebAssets SDK #47374
    8.0-preview5
  • Binding to a list with more than 255 items fails #48129
  • Introduce ListenOptions.GetServerCertificate #48055
  • Make https://github.com/aspnet/quickgridsamples public #48122
    Backlog
  • How to Base64UrlEncode in Blazor WebAssembly client now that Microsoft.AspNetCore.WebUtilities has been deprecated? #48068
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Polly: registering circuit breaker with parameters disables the breaker #48089
  • IWebHostEnvironment does not return the appropriate physical path when debugging #47909

PullRequests

Created

  • Load configuration in UseHttps #48138
    area-runtime
  • Make KestrelConfigurationLoader.Load safe to re-call #48137
    area-runtime
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2175980 #48131
    area-mvc

Merged

  • [Blazor] Invoke `receiveHotReloadAsync` directly #47964
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview5
  • Update SDK #48127
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • http.sys (6.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48072
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 6.0.18
  • Fix AOT test skip condition #48126
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview5
  • http.sys (7.0 backport): new option for response buffering #48073
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 7.0.7
  • [release/7.0] Don't generate RequestBody for parameters when disabledInferredBody is true #47807
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 7.0.7
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2175417 #48106
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fix StackOverflowException in RoutePatternAnalyzer #48105
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Unified app model routing #47759
    area-blazor
  • Expand support for MapX methods in RDG #48012
    feature-rdg, area-minimal
  • Skip counter measurement when start listening while processing #48045
    area-runtime
  • Add initial support for parameters with `AsParameters` attribute #47914
    area-web-frameworks
  • Replace ISystemClock with TimeProvider in Kestrel #48081
    area-runtime, servers-kestrel
  • Ensure DataProtection can be used in trimmed apps. #48082
    area-dataprotection
  • Testing updated install scripts #47951
    area-infrastructure, area-commandlinetools, * NO MERGE *, pending-ci-rerun
  • Avoid closure in IConnectionBuilder.Use #47845
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Change access modifier of ForceSignOut() #48102
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Uses Fallback When Without Repository #48103
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Add IAcceptsMetadata to RDG #47942
    area-runtime, feature-rdg
  • Use Node 18 (LTS) #48087
    area-infrastructure
  • Added TryAddPolicyRegistry extension methods for IPolicyRegistry #47821
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Scrollview does not calculate ContentHeight correctly on ios #14986
  • [Windows] Adding and Removing ContextMenus currently does not work #14984
    .NET 8
  • MAUI - binding native iOS Swift library #14982
  • XamlCompilation attribute does not work (Windows 10) for xaml files in Platform -> Windows. "IN RELEASE MODE" #14981
  • Release build doesn't deploy on iOS/iPhone emulator #14979
  • iOS - Grouped CollectionView doesn't render properly when VerticalOptions = FillAndExpand #14978
  • iOS - MediaPicker.PickPhotoAsync() doesn't work if Limited permission (Selected Photos) for Photo Gallery #14973
    .NET 8
  • Impossible to add UseWindowsForms in a MAUI project #14970
  • Shell.SetTabBarIsVisible is not working WinUI #14969
  • CollectionView's VerticalOptions are not working as intended on iOS. #14966
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android] Swapping the MainPage out with the same instance of FlyoutPage crashes the app #14866
    .NET 8
  • FlyoutPage crashes when FlyoutLayoutBehavior sets to Split on iPad #10291
    Backlog
  • FlyoutPage issues on iOS Tablets #7520
    Backlog
  • Android - Collectionview EmptyView not visible #10819
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [MacCatalyst] [iOS] Label goes out of the bounds of its parent when it has a bigger desired width than the parent constraints #14368
    Backlog
  • Label don't break (middletruncation) and overlap on the next grid's column #9084
    Backlog
  • Imagesource problem when page reload #14811

PullRequests

Created

  • Move Windows and iOS Frame measure and arrange to xplat layer #14987
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Workaround WinUI bug with adding/removing flyouts #14985

    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, layout-stack
  • Remove Controls Navigation Controller #14976
  • [Android] Fix issue invoking ReturnCommand #14972
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry

Merged

  • Remove view from previous containerview #14867
    platform/android 🤖, partner/cat 😻
  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    t/breaking 💥, area/layout 🔲, partner/cat 😻, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [android] improve layout performance of Label #14980

  • [Android] Fix CollectionView EmptyView #11763
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃
  • [iOS] Fix Label Truncation on iOS with HorizontalOptions #14453
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [android] reduce interop calls in MauiDrawable #14933
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Update XamlParseExceptionConstraint.cs(removed unused method) #14971
    community ✨

Updated

  • Add the Platform* APIs for Graphics #14816
  • [uitests] Work for get appium uitests with CI #14488
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fixed Android's StreamImageSourceService.LoadDrawableAsync() #14109
    area/image :framed_picture:
  • Make CollectionView on iOS measure to content size #14951
    area/collectionview 📃
  • [Windows] Fix crash swapping MainPage #14262
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/navigation 🧭
  • [Windows] Align Button VisualStates behavior with other platforms #14381
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Android] Fix issue in Entry Drawable using API Level 23 #14615
    platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Windows] Fix Border corners clipping issue #14403
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮, control-border
  • [iOS] Normalize the orientation from MediaPicker photos #14568
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/essentials 🍞
  • [iOS] Avoid crash setting custom icon in SearchHandler #14634
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢
  • Add SwipeItems to LogicalChildren #13864
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [Windows] Changes in SwipeViewHandler #11229

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dotnet scaffold fails without error when Default Schema is missing. #30845
  • GenerateCreateScript difference between 3.1 and 7.0 #30844
  • Shadow foreign key in self referencing table involved in many-to-many relationship with named join table throws IndexOutOfRangeException #30840

Closed

  • Got a runtime exception by trying to translate Linq query to SQL query #30838
  • Wishlist: No generate empty lines with public virtual DbSet<Foo> Foos { get; set; } and public virtual DbSet<ViewFoo> ViewFoos { get; set; } and modelBuilder.Entity<Foo>(...) #30839

PullRequests

Created

  • Update exception message for Cosmos subquery pushdown #30849
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.1.1 to 8.1.2 #30848
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Better support for inline primitive collections with parameters #30846
  • Update handling for bools and enums with database defaults #30843

Merged

  • Update SDK #30847

Updated

  • SQLite Scaffolding: Use column type and values to provide a better CLR type #30816

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-08
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Change property name #16341

Merged

  • Second attempt at reducing source-build tarball CI frequency #16340
  • Update source-build-tarball-build-official CI triggers to run on 1xx branches #16338
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #16335
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #16330

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1224: Build ID 2175983 #16135
